title: New Zealand: the land and it's people
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New Zealand - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New Zealand - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Maori (New Zealand people) - Ethnic identity
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Industries - New Zealand
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Agriculture - New Zealand
description: Classroom film depicting a trip through New Zealand's North and South Islands with scenes showing that this country of mountains, forests and grasslands is a modern nation whose people share many of the customs of all English-speaking people. Includes views of the livestock and dairying industries, the busy port cities, and the activities and recreation of the people of both European and Maori ancestry.
